results.overview: A homeless man is hired as a survival guide for a group of wealthy businessmen on a hunting trip in the mountains, unaware that they are killers who hunt humans for sport, and that he is their new prey.
results.title: Surviving the Game

results.original_title: Surviving the Game: Making The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
results.overview: An incredibly in depth and informative compendium of nine featurettes that address virtually every aspect of the film, from the adaptive process through the special effects, stunts and production design. There are a number of really well done interviews with most of the principal cast and crew.
results.title: Surviving the Game: Making The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
